fieldGroup.template: Could this research activity be carried out with a biological agent/material, hazardous chemicals, radioactive substances and/or nanoparticles of lower risk to health or the environment?

When the nature of the activity allows it, the researcher, taking into account the technical and scientific information available, is to avoid the use of dangerous biological materials/agents by replacing them with other agents that, depending on the conditions of use, are not dangerous, hazardous chemicals, radioactive substances and/or nanoparticles for the safety or health of workers and the environment, or are to a lesser extent (Article 5 RD664/1997).
